features: One 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica So Smooth Gardenia Shampoo
Lightweight shampoo gently cleanses and nourishes hair
Made with a plant-based blend of tropical ingredients
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Take a vacation from frizzy hair with Alba Botanica Go Smooth Gardenia Hawaiian Shampoo. No harsh sulfates or heavy silicones here - just botanical ingredients for soft and manageable hair with no fly-aways in sight. Our lightweight shampoo gently cleanses and nourishes hair with botanical treats like gardenia, pineapple and papaya, while conditioning agents like aloe and quinoa protein protect from humidity and frizziness. Our 100% vegetarian formula is pH-balanced and is not tested on animals, and it doesn't contain any parabens or phthalates. Includes one 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Go Smooth Gardenia Hawaiian Shampoo. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. Do beautiful – that’s the motto that motivates our body loving products that nourish the skin, hair and, of course, the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Go Smooth Gardenia Hawaiian Shampoo For a sleek, smooth style, take a permanent vacation from the drying sulfates and formaldehydes in ordinary shampoos. Instead, discover this veritably silky shampoo, infused with gentle botanical cleansers and nourishing gardenia. In testing it provided all day frizz control, even in high humidity, and split ends were repaired by 66% with a single use**.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list No Harsh Sulfates* We believe in using natural ingredients and not harsh sulfates that can damage the hair and scalp. Products that have too strong of a sulfate presence have been known to break down naturally occurring oils in your hair and scalp. At Alba Botanica, we provide products that advocate for a healthy scalp and healthy hair, without using harsh sulfates. *see ingredients list

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Hawaiian Go Smooth Gardenia Conditioner Hawaiian Drink-It-Up Coconut Milk Shampoo Hawaiian Colorific Plumeria Shampoo Hawaiian Colorific Plumeria Conditioner More Hawaiian Hair Care Products from Alba Botanica Our lightweight conditioner moisturizes and nourishes hair with tropical treats such as gardenia extract, quinoa protein and light tropical oils. With coconut milk, which is high in fatty acids and protein, this shampoo locks in moisture to strengthen your hair and reduce breakage. This shampoo gently cleanses and intensely conditions hair to lock in color, replenish moisture and restore softness. This conditioner intensely conditions hair to lock in color and replenish moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and Satisfying
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Alba Botanica So Smooth Shampoo Gardenia for several years now, and it has certainly left an impression:Scent: The gentle tropical scent is a pleasant addition to my shower routine. It’s not too overpowering but leaves a subtle, refreshing fragrance in my hair.Texture: The shampoo’s texture is just right—neither too runny nor too thick. It’s easy to work into a rich lather, making it a joy to use.Cleansing: This shampoo does a great job of cleansing my hair. It effectively removes dirt, oil, and styling product residues without over-drying or causing irritation.Hair Type: I have naturally curly hair, and while this shampoo works well for me, I feel it could offer a bit more in terms of maintaining my curls’ bounce and shape.Ingredients: One of the standout features is the use of natural and botanical ingredients. I appreciate that it’s free from harsh chemicals, making it a healthier choice for my hair.Performance: After using Alba Botanica So Smooth Shampoo, my hair feels smoother and more manageable. It helps reduce frizz and adds a subtle shine, which is a plus.Price: While it’s not the cheapest shampoo on the market, the quality justifies the cost. I consider it a good value for the benefits it offers.Overall: Alba Botanica So Smooth Shampoo Gardenia is a solid choice for those looking for a more natural, eco-conscious hair care option. While it may not be perfect for all hair types, it does a commendable job of delivering smoother, cleaner, and better-looking hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tried this at an airbnb in florida and it made my hair soft and manageable. I had volume and I actually really liked the scent although im not really into gardenia smell.There is no lather on this but i still like it. I live in Ny and the water is different here so it has a different effect on hair but still overall i am very satisfied with this shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and makes my hair feel soft no matter what conditioner I use with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, is a nice sulfate free option
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent. It is a lovely floral that I wish everything in my life smelled like. For now I will just have to settle for just my hair smelling this awesome. I have been trying different sulfate free shampoos and I think this one the best so far. I have been using it for over 2 months now. It takes a lot of product to work up a suds, even with a shampoo brush. Sometimes I actually need to "rinse and repeat" but since there aren't sulfates here to give a huge lather, that is to be expected. My hair comes out very clean. I would suggest this to a friend and buy again but BE SURE TO GET THE CONDITIONER. This shampoo is not moisturizing at all and you will need a conditioner with this shampoo. That being said, the Alba conditioners are great and a nice price and I will buy them again together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great shampoo that smells wonderful! I am surprised Whole Foods does not carry this product so I am happy I found it online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because of the other reviews that said the scent was amazing. I did not notice any lingering scent at all and for the price, not worth it. Other products work just as well for a fraction of the cost of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo without the cruelty and additives
reviews.reviewText: Finally an amazing replacement for Nature's Gate, which I used for years but it got too expensive and I could no longer find on retail shelves. My sister in law recommended Alba and I love it! Just as importantly to me is its all plant based, no sulfides and cruelty free (Leaping Bunny award). I'm all in!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product poor packaging care
reviews.reviewText: I love the productThe shampoo wasn’t tied enough and it leaked on other items

reviews.reviewTitle: Turn washing your hair into a vacation in the tropics
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful natural fragrance of gardenias. For people who like a strong fragrance it takes you away to sunny days in the tropics and leaves your hair soft shiny and manageable. Use with gardenia conditioner for the full experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 18, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing and leaves my hair very soft and silky. Definitely feels better being paraben free.

This shampoo and the same conditioner works great, smells amazing, and is all natural! Yes it is more expensive then most, but I find the bottle still lasts me over a month. Great service by amazon as well, delivered next day :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2012
reviews.reviewText: The smell is great and it has a heady lather but it doesn't do much else for my hair. May use for body wash or to shampoo my guinea pigs.

reviews.reviewTitle: I will keep using these products.
reviews.reviewText: I like these products the shampoo and conditioned they strengthen my hair and no split ends or my hair falling out during washing.
